name: Agora Strategy Institute GmbH
goal: The Agora Strategy Institute serves as think-tank unit of the Agora Strategy Group AG with highly informed and straight-to-the-point analysis. The scope reaches from political risk assessment for business-related decisions over thorough analysis of framework conditions and geopolitical developments in countries around the world. Agora Strategy draws on strong political expertise and a unique global network of high-ranking decision-makers as well as policy experts.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, Foreign affairs and security policy, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Cooperation and Verification Mechanism; CRD IV and follow-up legislation; Europe 2020
